Uses of Package
com.jalios.jcms.servlet

  • Packages that use com.jalios.jcms.servlet 
    Package Description
    com.jalios.jcms.ajax  
    com.jalios.jcms.db  
    com.jalios.jcms.handler
    Contains the javabean classes uses to process HTTP request (aka form handlers).
    com.jalios.jcms.plugin  
    com.jalios.jcms.servlet
    Contains JPlatform servlet classes.
    com.jalios.jcms.test  
    com.jalios.jcms.upload  
    com.jalios.jcms.webdav
    Contains classes which provides webdav access to JPlatform.
  • Classes in com.jalios.jcms.servlet used by com.jalios.jcms.ajax 
    Class Description
    JcmsServletFilter
    Convenient super class for servlet filter developped in JCMS.

    As of current implementation, this class mainly provides the method processFilter(ServletRequest) to prevent multiple processing of the filter under weblogic.
  • Classes in com.jalios.jcms.servlet used by com.jalios.jcms.db 
    Class Description
    JcmsServletFilter
    Convenient super class for servlet filter developped in JCMS.

  • Classes in com.jalios.jcms.servlet used by com.jalios.jcms.servlet 
    Class Description
    JcmsServlet
    This convenient Servlet abstract class: redirects doPost() on doGet sets the channel attribute implements JcmsConstants
